verses.verse: Then <WG1161> said <WG2036> the high priest <WG749>, Are <WG1487> <WG686> <WG2192> these things <WG5023> so <WG3779>?

And <WG1161> he said <WG5346>, Men <WG435>, brethren <WG80>, and <WG2532> fathers <WG3962>, hearken <WG191>; The God <WG2316> of glory <WG1391> appeared <WG3700> unto our <WG2257> father <WG3962> Abraham <WG11>, when he was <WG5607> in <WG1722> Mesopotamia <WG3318>, before <WG4250> <WG2228> he <WG846> dwelt <WG2730> in <WG1722> Charran <WG5488>,

And <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, Get thee <WG1831> out of <WG1537> thy <WG4675> country <WG1093>, and <WG2532> from <WG1537> thy <WG4675> kindred <WG4772>, and <WG2532> come <WG1204> into <WG1519> the land <WG1093> which <WG3739> <WG302> I shall shew <WG1166> thee <WG4671>.

Then <WG5119> came he <WG1831> out of <WG1537> the land <WG1093> of the Chaldaeans <WG5466>, and dwelt <WG2730> in <WG1722> Charran <WG5488>: and from thence <WG2547>, when <WG3326> his <WG846> father <WG3962> was dead <WG599>, he removed <WG3351> him <WG846> into <WG1519> this <WG5026> land <WG1093>, wherein <WG1519> <WG3739> ye <WG5210> now <WG3568> dwell <WG2730>.

And <WG2532> he gave <WG1325> him <WG846> none <WG3756> inheritance <WG2817> in <WG1722> it <WG846>, no, not <WG3761> so much as to set <WG968> his foot <WG4228> on <WG968>: yet <WG2532> he promised <WG1861> that he would give <WG1325> it <WG846> to him <WG846> for <WG1519> a possession <WG2697>, and <WG2532> to his <WG846> seed <WG4690> after <WG3326> him <WG846>, when as yet he <WG846> had <WG5607> no <WG3756> child <WG5043>.

And <WG1161> God <WG2316> spake <WG2980> on this wise <WG3779>, That <WG3754> his <WG846> seed <WG4690> should <WG2071> sojourn <WG3941> in <WG1722> a strange <WG245> land <WG1093>; and <WG2532> that they should bring <WG1402> them <WG846> into bondage <WG1402>, and <WG2532> entreat them evil <WG2559> four hundred <WG5071> years <WG2094>.

And <WG2532> the nation <WG1484> to whom <WG3739> <WG1437> they shall be in bondage <WG1398> will <WG2919> I <WG1473> judge <WG2919>, said <WG2036> God <WG2316>: and <WG2532> after <WG3326> that <WG5023> shall they come forth <WG1831>, and <WG2532> serve <WG3000> me <WG3427> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> place <WG5117>.

And <WG2532> he gave <WG1325> him <WG846> the covenant <WG1242> of circumcision <WG4061>: and <WG2532> so <WG3779> Abraham begat <WG1080> Isaac <WG2464>, and <WG2532> circumcised <WG4059> him <WG846> the eighth <WG3590> day <WG2250>; and <WG2532> Isaac <WG2464> begat Jacob <WG2384>; and <WG2532> Jacob <WG2384> begat the twelve <WG1427> patriarchs <WG3966>.
And <WG2532> the patriarchs <WG3966>, moved with envy <WG2206>, sold <WG591> Joseph <WG2501> into <WG1519> Egypt <WG125>: but <WG2532> God <WG2316> was <WG2258> with <WG3326> him <WG846>,

And <WG2532> delivered <WG1807> him <WG846> out of <WG1537> all <WG3956> his <WG846> afflictions <WG2347>, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> him <WG846> favour <WG5485> and <WG2532> wisdom <WG4678> in the sight <WG1726> of Pharaoh <WG5328> king <WG935> of Egypt <WG125>; and <WG2532> he made <WG2525> him <WG846> governor <WG2233> over <WG1909> Egypt <WG125> and <WG2532> all <WG3650> his <WG846> house <WG3624>.

Now <WG1161> there came <WG2064> a dearth <WG3042> over <WG1909> all <WG3650> the land <WG1093> of Egypt <WG125> and <WG2532> Chanaan <WG5477>, and <WG2532> great <WG3173> affliction <WG2347>: and <WG2532> our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962> found <WG2147> no <WG3756> sustenance <WG5527>.
But <WG1161> when Jacob <WG2384> heard <WG191> that there was <WG5607> corn <WG4621> in <WG1722> Egypt <WG125>, he sent out <WG1821> our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962> first <WG4412>.

And <WG2532> at <WG1722> the second <WG1208> time Joseph <WG2501> was made known <WG319> to his <WG846> brethren <WG80>; and <WG2532> Joseph's <WG2501> kindred <WG1085> was made <WG1096> known <WG5318> unto Pharaoh <WG5328>.

Then <WG1161> sent <WG649> Joseph <WG2501>, and called <WG3333> his <WG846> father <WG3962> Jacob <WG2384> to him, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> his <WG846> kindred <WG4772> <WG1722>, threescore <WG1440> and fifteen <WG4002> souls <WG5590>.
So <WG1161> Jacob <WG2384> went down <WG2597> into <WG1519> Egypt <WG125>, and <WG2532> died <WG5053>, he <WG846>, and <WG2532> our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962>,

And <WG2532> were carried over <WG3346> into <WG1519> Sychem <WG4966>, and <WG2532> laid <WG5087> in <WG1722> the sepulchre <WG3418> that <WG3739> Abraham <WG11> bought <WG5608> for a sum <WG5092> of money <WG694> of <WG3844> the sons <WG5207> of Emmor <WG1697> the father <WG3588> of Sychem <WG4966>.

But <WG1161> when <WG2531> the time <WG5550> of the promise <WG1860> drew nigh <WG1448>, which <WG3739> God <WG2316> had sworn <WG3660> to Abraham <WG11>, the people <WG2992> grew <WG837> and <WG2532> multiplied <WG4129> in <WG1722> Egypt <WG125>,
Till <WG891> <WG3739> another <WG2087> king <WG935> arose <WG450>, which <WG3739> knew <WG1492> not <WG3756> Joseph <WG2501>.

The same <WG3778> dealt subtilly <WG2686> with our <WG2257> kindred <WG1085>, and evil entreated <WG2559> our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962>, so that <WG4160> they cast out <WG1570> their <WG846> young children <WG1025>, to the end <WG1519> they might <WG2225> not <WG3361> live <WG2225>.

In <WG1722> which <WG3739> time <WG2540> Moses <WG3475> was born <WG1080>, and <WG2532> was <WG2258> exceeding <WG2316> fair <WG791>, and <WG3739> nourished up <WG397> in <WG1722> his <WG846> father's <WG3962> house <WG3624> three <WG5140> months <WG3376>:

And <WG1161> when he <WG846> was cast out <WG1620>, Pharaoh's <WG5328> daughter <WG2364> took <WG337> him <WG846> up <WG337>, and <WG2532> nourished <WG397> him <WG846> for <WG1519> her own <WG1438> son <WG5207>.

And <WG2532> Moses <WG3475> was learned <WG3811> in all <WG3956> the wisdom <WG4678> of the Egyptians <WG124>, and <WG1161> was <WG2258> mighty <WG1415> in <WG1722> words <WG3056> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> deeds <WG2041>.

And <WG1161> when <WG5613> he <WG846> was full <WG4137> forty years <WG5063> old <WG5550>, it came <WG305> into <WG1909> his <WG846> heart <WG2588> to visit <WG1980> his <WG846> brethren <WG80> the children <WG5207> of Israel <WG2474>.

And <WG2532> seeing <WG1492> one <WG5100> of them suffer wrong <WG91>, he defended <WG292> him, and <WG2532> avenged <WG1557> <WG4160> him that was oppressed <WG2669>, and smote <WG3960> the Egyptian <WG124>:

For <WG1161> he supposed <WG3543> his <WG846> brethren <WG80> would have understood <WG4920> how <WG3754> that God <WG2316> by <WG1223> his <WG846> hand <WG5495> would deliver <WG1325> <WG4991> them <WG846>: but <WG1161> they understood <WG4920> not <WG3756>.

And <WG5037> the next <WG1966> day <WG2250> he shewed himself <WG3700> unto them <WG846> as they strove <WG3164>, and <WG2532> would have set <WG4900> them <WG846> at <WG1519> one again <WG1515>, saying <WG2036>, Sirs <WG435>, ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> brethren <WG80>; why <WG2444> do ye wrong <WG91> one to another <WG240>?

But <WG1161> he that did <WG91> his neighbour <WG4139> wrong <WG91> thrust <WG683> him <WG846> away <WG683>, saying <WG2036>, Who <WG5101> made <WG2525> thee <WG4571> a ruler <WG758> and <WG2532> a judge <WG1348> over <WG1909> us <WG2248>?
Wilt <WG3361> <WG2309> thou <WG4771> kill <WG337> me <WG3165>, as <WG3739> <WG5158> thou diddest <WG337> the Egyptian <WG124> yesterday <WG5504>?

Then <WG1161> fled <WG5343> Moses <WG3475> at <WG1722> this <WG5129> saying <WG3056>, and <WG2532> was <WG1096> a stranger <WG3941> in <WG1722> the land <WG1093> of Madian <WG3099>, where <WG3757> he begat <WG1080> two <WG1417> sons <WG5207>.

And <WG2532> when forty <WG5062> years <WG2094> were expired <WG4137>, there appeared <WG3700> to him <WG846> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048> of mount <WG3735> Sina <WG4614> an angel <WG32> of the Lord <WG2962> in <WG1722> a flame <WG5395> of fire <WG4442> in a bush <WG942>.

When <WG1161> Moses <WG3475> saw <WG1492> it, he wondered <WG2296> at the sight <WG3705>: and <WG1161> as he <WG846> drew near <WG4334> to behold <WG2657> it, the voice <WG5456> of the Lord <WG2962> came <WG1096> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>,

Saying, I <WG1473> am the God <WG2316> of thy <WG4675> fathers <WG3962>, the God <WG2316> of Abraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> the God <WG2316> of Isaac <WG2464>, and <WG2532> the God <WG2316> of Jacob <WG2384>. Then <WG1161> Moses <WG3475> trembled <WG1096> <WG1790>, and durst <WG5111> not <WG3756> behold <WG2657>.

Then <WG1161> said <WG2036> the Lord <WG2962> to him <WG846>, Put off <WG3089> thy shoes <WG5266> from thy <WG4675> feet <WG4228>: for <WG1063> the place <WG5117> where <WG1722> <WG3739> thou standest <WG2476> is <WG2076> holy <WG40> ground <WG1093>.

I have seen <WG1492>, I have seen <WG1492> the affliction <WG2561> of my <WG3450> people <WG2992> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> Egypt <WG125>, and <WG2532> I have heard <WG191> their <WG846> groaning <WG4726>, and <WG2532> am come down <WG2597> to deliver <WG1807> them <WG846>. And <WG2532> now <WG3568> come <WG1204>, I will send <WG649> thee <WG4571> into <WG1519> Egypt <WG125>.

This <WG5126> Moses <WG3475> whom <WG3739> they refused <WG720>, saying <WG2036>, Who <WG5101> made <WG2525> thee <WG4571> a ruler <WG758> and <WG2532> a judge <WG1348>? the same <WG5126> did God <WG2316> send <WG649> to be a ruler <WG758> and <WG2532> a deliverer <WG3086> by <WG1722> the hand <WG5495> of the angel <WG32> which <WG3588> appeared <WG3700> to him <WG846> in <WG1722> the bush <WG942>.

He <WG3778> brought <WG1806> them <WG846> out <WG1806>, after that he had shewed <WG4160> wonders <WG5059> and <WG2532> signs <WG4592> in <WG1722> the land <WG1093> of Egypt <WG125>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the Red <WG2063> sea <WG2281>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048> forty <WG5062> years <WG2094>.

¶ This <WG3778> is <WG2076> that Moses <WG3475>, which <WG3588> said <WG2036> unto the children <WG5207> of Israel <WG2474>, A prophet <WG4396> shall <WG450> the Lord <WG2962> your <WG5216> God <WG2316> raise up <WG450> unto you <WG5213> of <WG1537> your <WG5216> brethren <WG80>, like <WG5613> unto me <WG1691>; him <WG846> shall ye hear <WG191>.

This <WG3778> is he <WG2076>, that was <WG1096> in <WG1722> the church <WG1577> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048> with <WG3326> the angel <WG32> which <WG3588> spake <WG2980> to him <WG846> in <WG1722> the mount <WG3735> Sina <WG4614>, and <WG2532> with our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962>: who <WG3739> received <WG1209> the lively <WG2198> oracles <WG3051> to give <WG1325> unto us <WG2254>:

To whom <WG3739> our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962> would <WG2309> not <WG3756> obey <WG1096> <WG5255>, but <WG235> thrust him from them <WG683>, and <WG2532> in their <WG846> hearts <WG2588> turned back again <WG4762> into <WG1519> Egypt <WG125>,

Saying <WG2036> unto Aaron <WG2>, Make <WG4160> us <WG2254> gods <WG2316> to <WG3739> go before <WG4313> us <WG2257>: for <WG1063> as for this <WG3778> Moses <WG3475>, which <WG3739> brought <WG1806> us <WG2248> out of <WG1537> the land <WG1093> of Egypt <WG125>, we wot <WG1492> not <WG3756> what <WG5101> is become <WG1096> of him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> they made a calf <WG3447> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250>, and <WG2532> offered <WG321> sacrifice <WG2378> unto the idol <WG1497>, and <WG2532> rejoiced <WG2165> in <WG1722> the works <WG2041> of their own <WG846> hands <WG5495>.

Then <WG1161> God <WG2316> turned <WG4762>, and <WG2532> gave <WG3860> them <WG846> up <WG3860> to worship <WG3000> the host <WG4756> of heaven <WG3772>; as it <WG2531> is written <WG1125> in <WG1722> the book <WG976> of the prophets <WG4396>, O ye house <WG3624> of Israel <WG2474>, have ye offered <WG3361> <WG4374> to me <WG3427> slain beasts <WG4968> and <WG2532> sacrifices <WG2378> by the space of forty <WG5062> years <WG2094> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048>?

Yea <WG2532>, ye took up <WG353> the tabernacle <WG4633> of Moloch <WG3434>, and <WG2532> the star <WG798> of your <WG5216> god <WG2316> Remphan <WG4481>, figures <WG5179> which <WG3739> ye made <WG4160> to worship <WG4352> them <WG846>: and <WG2532> I will carry <WG3351> you <WG5209> away <WG3351> beyond <WG1900> Babylon <WG897>.

Our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962> had <WG2258> the tabernacle <WG4633> of witness <WG3142> <WG1722> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048>, as <WG2531> he had appointed <WG1299>, speaking <WG2980> unto Moses <WG3475>, that he should make <WG4160> it <WG846> according <WG2596> to the fashion <WG5179> that <WG3739> he had seen <WG3708>.

Which <WG3739> also <WG2532> our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962> that came <WG1237> after brought in <WG1521> with <WG3326> Jesus <WG2424> into <WG1722> the possession <WG2697> of the Gentiles <WG1484>, whom <WG3739> God <WG2316> drave out <WG1856> before <WG575> the face <WG4383> of our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962>, unto <WG2193> the days <WG2250> of David <WG1138>;
Who <WG3739> found <WG2147> favour <WG5485> before <WG1799> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> desired <WG154> to find <WG2147> a tabernacle <WG4638> for the God <WG2316> of Jacob <WG2384>.
But <WG1161> Solomon <WG4672> built <WG3618> him <WG846> an house <WG3624>.
Howbeit <WG235> the most High <WG5310> dwelleth <WG2730> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> temples <WG3485> made with hands <WG5499>; as <WG2531> saith <WG3004> the prophet <WG4396>,

Heaven <WG3772> is my <WG3427> throne <WG2362>, and <WG1161> earth <WG1093> is my <WG3450> footstool <WG4228> <WG5286>: what <WG4169> house <WG3624> will ye build <WG3618> me <WG3427>? saith <WG3004> the Lord <WG2962>: or <WG2228> what <WG5101> is the place <WG5117> of my <WG3450> rest <WG2663>?
Hath <WG4160> not <WG3780> my <WG3450> hand <WG5495> made <WG4160> all <WG3956> these things <WG5023>?

¶ Ye stiffnecked <WG4644> and <WG2532> uncircumcised <WG564> in heart <WG2588> and <WG2532> ears <WG3775>, ye <WG5210> do <WG496> always <WG104> resist <WG496> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>: as <WG5613> your <WG5216> fathers <WG3962> did, so <WG2532> do ye <WG5210>.

Which <WG5101> of the prophets <WG4396> have <WG1377> not <WG3756> your <WG5216> fathers <WG3962> persecuted <WG1377>? and <WG2532> they have slain <WG615> them which <WG3588> shewed before <WG4293> of <WG4012> the coming <WG1660> of the Just One <WG1342>; of whom <WG3739> ye <WG5210> have been <WG1096> now <WG3568> the betrayers <WG4273> and <WG2532> murderers <WG5406>:
Who <WG3748> have received <WG2983> the law <WG3551> by <WG1519> the disposition <WG1296> of angels <WG32>, and <WG2532> have <WG5442> not <WG3756> kept <WG5442> it.
¶ When <WG1161> they heard <WG191> these things <WG5023>, they were cut <WG1282> to the heart <WG2588> <WG846>, and <WG2532> they gnashed <WG1031> on <WG1909> him <WG846> with their teeth <WG3599>.

But <WG1161> he, being <WG5225> full <WG4134> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>, looked up stedfastly <WG816> into <WG1519> heaven <WG3772>, and saw <WG1492> the glory <WG1391> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> standing <WG2476> on <WG1537> the right hand <WG1188> of God <WG2316>,

And <WG2532> said <WG2036>, Behold <WG2400>, I see <WG2334> the heavens <WG3772> opened <WG455>, and <WG2532> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> standing <WG2476> on <WG1537> the right hand <WG1188> of God <WG2316>.

Then <WG1161> they cried out <WG2896> with a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, and stopped <WG4912> their <WG846> ears <WG3775>, and <WG2532> ran <WG3729> upon <WG1909> him <WG846> with one accord <WG3661>,

And <WG2532> cast <WG1544> him out of <WG1854> the city <WG4172>, and stoned <WG3036> him: and <WG2532> the witnesses <WG3144> laid down <WG659> their <WG846> clothes <WG2440> at <WG3844> a young man's <WG3494> feet <WG4228>, whose name was <WG2564> Saul <WG4569>.
And <WG2532> they stoned <WG3036> Stephen <WG4736>, calling upon <WG1941> God, and <WG2532> saying <WG3004>, Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424>, receive <WG1209> my <WG3450> spirit <WG4151>.

And <WG1161> he kneeled down <WG5087> <WG1119>, and cried <WG2896> with a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, Lord <WG2962>, lay <WG2476> not <WG3361> this <WG5026> sin <WG266> to their <WG846> charge. And <WG2532> when he had said <WG2036> this <WG5124>, he fell asleep <WG2837>.
